title: RHOBH: How Many Mucks Do I Give?
description: This week on Real Housewives of Beverly Hills, Erika yells at Garcelle's 14-year-old son, and Sutton throws a mucky luncheon. Plus, Mauricio scratches his marble counter!
author: watchwhatcrappens@gmail.com (benron)
